content.p: Explore the webpages below to find all the information you need to support you through your postgraduate research journey - from your initial registration up until graduation. These webpages should be read in conjunction with the University’s quality manual. See processes and policies that apply during your research including registration, training and induction and more Find out about the thesis-pending period and if you’re eligible, to include council tax exemption information Everything you need to know about your thesis submission, including word count, formats and submission deadlines Read information relating to your research assessment, including award criteria, roles of examiners and advice on timings, location and format of your viva voce Further information relating to the Researcher academy During your PGR studies you may be required to obtain official documents from the University of Nottingham
